sentences.en: "Get in your car and follow me," he com-manded.
sentences.cn: “上你自己的车，跟在我后面。”他命令道。

sentences.en: "I don't follow football," she said with an apologetic smile.
sentences.cn: “我不懂足球，”她歉然一笑道。

sentences.en: "Wait there!" Kathryn rose. "No, on second thought, follow me."
sentences.cn: “在那儿等着！”凯瑟琳站起身来，“不，我改主意了。跟我来。”

sentences.en: All we had to do was follow the map.
sentences.cn: 我们所要做的就是按照地图走。

sentences.en: Are those men following us?
sentences.cn: 那些人在跟着我们吗？

sentences.en: followed along with the song.
sentences.cn: 伴随着歌曲

sentences.en: followed through on her promise to reorganize the department.
sentences.cn: 把诺言贯彻到底，重新组建部门

sentences.en: followed up her interview with a telephone call.
sentences.cn: 用电话进一步完成面试

sentences.en: followed up their recommendations with concrete proposals.
sentences.cn: 运用具体的建议把计划执行到底

sentences.en: Good fortune will follow you, both in this world and the next.
sentences.cn: 无论今世还是来生，好运都会伴随你。

sentences.en: had no formal training but became a success by following his nose.
sentences.cn: 没有经过正式的培训却凭直觉取得了成功

sentences.en: He decided on roast chicken and vegetables, with apple pie to follow.
sentences.cn: 他决定点烤鸡配蔬菜，然后再要一份苹果派。

sentences.en: He followed the doctor’s advice and had no further trouble.
sentences.cn: 他听从了医生的建议，就没有再出现问题。

sentences.en: I decided to follow up the letters with phone calls.
sentences.cn: 我决定写完信之后再打电话继续追查。

sentences.en: I respect his judgement and I'll follow any advice he gives me.
sentences.cn: 我尊重他的判断能力，会接受他提出的任何建议。

sentences.en: I'm new here and all I did was follow orders.
sentences.cn: 我新来乍到，我所做的事情都是按照命令行事。

sentences.en: Just hold tight to my hand and follow along.
sentences.cn: 抓紧我的手，跟着我。

sentences.en: Mr Smith was obstructive and refused to follow correct procedure.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生故意刁难，就是不肯照章办事。

sentences.en: Other problems may follow.
sentences.cn: 其它问题也许会随之而来。

sentences.en: Take your time, don't cut corners and follow instructions to the letter.
sentences.cn: 慢慢来，不要图省事，要严格按照说明去做。

sentences.en: the announcement followed on from the collapse of the merchant bank.
sentences.cn: 那家商业银行倒闭后，发表了这个布告。

sentences.en: The conclusion that follows from these findings is that inner city schools need more investment, not less.
sentences.cn: 根据这些调研得出的结论是，旧城区学校的资金投入需要增加，而不是减少。

sentences.en: The patient was seen for follow-up visits once every three months.
sentences.cn: 这位病人每三个月接受一次随访就诊。

sentences.en: The patrol car followed the BMW for a few miles and then lost it.
sentences.cn: 巡逻车跟了那辆宝马几英里，后来就跟丢了。

sentences.en: They follow minutely the news from abroad on Cable News Network.
sentences.cn: 他们密切追踪有线电视新闻网上的国外新闻。

sentences.en: Tom’s already gone out to Rome and his wife and children will follow shortly.
sentences.cn: 汤姆已经去罗马了，他的妻儿很快就会跟着去。

sentences.en: Where eastern Germany goes the rest will surely follow.
sentences.cn: 东德怎样做，其他地方一定会效仿。

sentences.en: you are on the right track so follow your nose.
sentences.cn: 你的方向正确，可以凭直觉干。

sentences.en: You won't have to think, just follow your nose.
sentences.cn: 你不必思考，跟着你的直觉走。

words.tran_cn: 追随;跟随;跟从;追赶;追逐

phrases.tran_cn: （所述）：接着将作出说明。用来介绍特定的细目、解释和命令
【非正式用语】 由直觉指引
遵从，依照：协调地或遵照原例移动或操作
（板球）继续击球（第一局得分少的球队先击球）
紧追，对…进行进一步调查
模仿：做别人已经做过的事；以…为例子
按照说明；听从指示；按照技术指导
坚持到底：贯彻一个行动、项目或完成某项意图；全力追求
使更进一步，使更成功：通过进一步行动增加效果或提高成功性
追逐你的梦想（沃德公司的广告语）

trans.tran_en: to go, walk, drive etc behind or after someone else

trans.tran_cn: 跟随，接着…发生，可以推断出，接下来是，沿着，注视，遵从，仿效，沿袭，理解，对…感兴趣，以…为原型，信奉
trans.tran_en: to go, walk, drive etc behind or after someone else
